comment.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS):

I tried your code in [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15mQd6kBRzriaVEjdELujex2YKFfWaA8JQ/?Post:10:Another+attempt+at+autoplaying/looping+MP4) and viewing in both Vivaldi and Firefox. Still no autoplay. I even tried changing things in Firefox's `about:config` but still no autoplay.

re optional: I did it on my sandbox and I *think* it had an effect. I *think* I remember that the zite was using up 55% of its 10MB space before making  `data/img/` (where I've also got my videos) optional. Now it's only using 12%.

@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk: Interesting. And confusing :) And now *another* ZeroBlog derivative to consider!

In your experience, what are the benefits (& drawbacks, if any) of "ZB+"?
